hpar 1.23.2

  • Changelog

HPA gene query

getHpa.Rd

Queries one if the HPA data sets with the id Ensembl gene identifier. The data set to be used is defined by the hpadata argument.

getHpa(id, hpadata = NULL, type = c("data", "details"))

Arguments

id

A Ensembl gene identifier.
hpadata

A character with the data set to query. One of available hpar datasets, available by calling allHparData (or any unambiguous prefix), or NULL (default). In the latter case, the default option is used. See setHparOptions and getHparOptions for more details.
type

A character defining what type data to return. One of data (default, for the data as data.frame) or details (to open the id's HPA webpage).

Value

A data.frame with the information corresponding to the respective id genes. If type is details, then the dataframe is returned invisibly and a web page is opened with browseURL.

Examples

id <- "ENSG00000000003"
## Define 'hpadata' data manually
getHpa(id, hpadata = "hpaSubcellularLoc")
#>              Gene Gene.name Reliability Enhanced Supported Approved Uncertain
#> 1 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6    Approved                     Cytosol          
#>   Single.cell.variation.intensity Single.cell.variation.spatial
#> 1                                                              
#>   Cell.cycle.dependency                GO.id
#> 1                       Cytosol (GO:0005829)
head(getHpa(id, hpadata = "hpaNormalTissue"), )
#>              Gene Gene.name        Tissue           Cell.type        Level
#> 1 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6 adrenal gland     glandular cells Not detected
#> 2 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6      appendix     glandular cells       Medium
#> 3 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6      appendix     lymphoid tissue Not detected
#> 4 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6   bone marrow hematopoietic cells Not detected
#> 5 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6        breast          adipocytes Not detected
#> 6 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6        breast     glandular cells         High
#>   Reliability
#> 1    Approved
#> 2    Approved
#> 3    Approved
#> 4    Approved
#> 5    Approved
#> 6    Approved
head(getHpa(id, hpadata = "rnaGeneTissue"))
#>              Gene Gene.name          Sample Value Unit
#> 1 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6  adipose tissue  31.5  TPM
#> 2 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6   adrenal gland  26.4  TPM
#> 3 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6        appendix   9.2  TPM
#> 4 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6     bone marrow   0.7  TPM
#> 5 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6          breast  53.4  TPM
#> 6 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6 cerebral cortex  18.5  TPM
head(getHpa(id, hpadata = "rnaGeneCellLine"))
#>              Gene Gene.name    Sample Value Unit
#> 1 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6     A-431  27.8  TPM
#> 2 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6      A549  37.6  TPM
#> 3 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6      AF22 108.1  TPM
#> 4 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6    AN3-CA  51.8  TPM
#> 5 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6  ASC diff  32.3  TPM
#> 6 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6 ASC TERT1  17.7  TPM
head(getHpa(id, hpadata = "hpaCancer"))
#>              Gene Gene.name             Cancer High Medium Low Not.detected
#> 1 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6      breast cancer    1      7   2            2
#> 2 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6          carcinoid    0      1   1            2
#> 3 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6    cervical cancer   11      1   0            0
#> 4 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6  colorectal cancer    0      6   2            2
#> 5 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6 endometrial cancer   10      2   0            0
#> 6 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6             glioma    0      0   0           11
#>   prognostic.favourable unprognostic.favourable prognostic.unfavourable
#> 1                    NA                0.077120                      NA
#> 2                    NA                      NA                      NA
#> 3                    NA                0.089670                      NA
#> 4                    NA                0.035620                      NA
#> 5                    NA                      NA                      NA
#> 6                    NA                0.003617                      NA
#>   unprognostic.unfavourable
#> 1                        NA
#> 2                        NA
#> 3                        NA
#> 4                        NA
#> 5                    0.2567
#> 6                        NA
## Sets default to "SubcellularLoc"
setHparOptions(hpadata = "hpaSubcellularLoc")
getHpa(id)       ## now uses "hpaSubcellularLoc"
#>              Gene Gene.name Reliability Enhanced Supported Approved Uncertain
#> 1 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6    Approved                     Cytosol          
#>   Single.cell.variation.intensity Single.cell.variation.spatial
#> 1                                                              
#>   Cell.cycle.dependency                GO.id
#> 1                       Cytosol (GO:0005829)
setHparOptions() ## reset to "hpaNormalTissue"
head(getHpa(id))
#>              Gene Gene.name        Tissue           Cell.type        Level
#> 1 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6 adrenal gland     glandular cells Not detected
#> 2 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6      appendix     glandular cells       Medium
#> 3 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6      appendix     lymphoid tissue Not detected
#> 4 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6   bone marrow hematopoietic cells Not detected
#> 5 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6        breast          adipocytes Not detected
#> 6 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6        breast     glandular cells         High
#>   Reliability
#> 1    Approved
#> 2    Approved
#> 3    Approved
#> 4    Approved
#> 5    Approved
#> 6    Approved
## multiple ids
getHpa(id = c("ENSG00000000003", "ENSG00000000005"),
       hpadata = "hpaSubcellularLoc")
#>              Gene Gene.name Reliability Enhanced Supported Approved Uncertain
#> 1 ENSG00000000003    TSPAN6    Approved                     Cytosol          
#>   Single.cell.variation.intensity Single.cell.variation.spatial
#> 1                                                              
#>   Cell.cycle.dependency                GO.id
#> 1                       Cytosol (GO:0005829)
# NOT RUN {
## opens a browser with http://www.proteinatlas.org/ENSG00000163435
getHpa("ENSG00000163435", type = "details")
# }
